info.description: APIs to support managing worker paid hours reports for organizations participating in JEDx
info.title: Worker Paid Hours Reports

tags.name: Worker Paid Hours Report Management
tags.description: Manage worker paid hours reports for participant organizations

get.description: Retrieve a list of worker paid hours reports matching the filter criteria

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The OData $filter parameter MUST be used to specify worker filter criterion

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The OData $select parameter MUST be used to specify the selection criterion
Accept-Language:language|*;q=qvalue. Specifies the language(s) that are acceptable for the response. The optional qvalue represents a quality level for acceptable languages.
parameters.name: Accept-Language

ETag.description: Defines the entity tag for use with the If-Match and If-None-Match request headers

Last-Modified.description: Specifies the date and time the representational state of the resource was last modified

Content-Language.description: Specifies the languages for which the entity-body is intended

OAGi-MessageID.description: Contains the message identifier of the message instance (i.e. request or the response)

OAGi-CorrelationID.description: Contains the message identifier that can be used to correlate the response with the previous / future requests. Usually used for asynchronous / callback style communication.

schema.title: WorkerPaidHoursReportsSchema
schema.description: A list of worker paid hours reports

items.title: WorkerPaidHoursType
items.description: The hours a worker was paid for time off or actual time worked.

PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType.title: PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType
PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

includedDayOfMonth.description: Specifies pay period that includes this day, i.e The person worked during this pay period that includes the 12th.
includedDayOfMonth.title: DayOfMonthType

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

WorkedHoursType.title: WorkedHoursType
WorkedHoursType.description: Specifies the hours worked for a specific pay type. For example, 8 hours of holiday pay.

workedPayTypeCode.description: Type of compensation, e.g. holiday, overtime, shift differential, etc.
workedPayTypeCode.title: PayTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

workedHours.description: Number of hours worked for a specific pay type.
workedHours.title: NumberType

TimeOffHoursType.title: TimeOffHoursType
TimeOffHoursType.description: The hours a worker took off. For example, 8 hours of vacation pay.

timeOffTypeCode.description: The type of hours a worker took off, such as bereavement, jury duty, vacation, etc.
timeOffTypeCode.title: TimeOffTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

timeOffHours.description: Number of hours a worker took off.
timeOffHours.title: NumberType

allOf.description: A common type that should be included at the top level of schemas.

allOf.title: DataProtectionPolicyInclusion
allOf.description: Data protection policy according General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).

retentionDate.description: Date until allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDays' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.
retentionDate.title: DateType

retentionDays.description: Number of days allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDate' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.
country.title: CountryCodeList
enumNames: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. It should contain an ISO 3166-2 code for the country. Example would be 'US-CA' for California for further restrictions based on the CCPA regulation.

items.title: AddressComponentType
items.description: Holds address extension components.

type.description: Specify purpose of this extension (province, secondary line, house number, etc).

policy.description: The description of the data protection policy (optionally associated with the country and optional region).

documentId.description: Provides the Identifier(s) of the document being communicated. Uniquely identifies a Document within an organization.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

items.title: IdentifierType
items.description: An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency. Use this type when the list or values are controlled by an external entity, the list or values are public and could be referenced or validated.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

workerId.description: Provides a unique identifier to a specific worker (an employer specific identifier).
workerId.title: IdentifierType

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

paidForWorkInPayPeriod.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

items.title: PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType
items.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

includedDayOfMonth.description: Specifies pay period that includes this day, i.e The person worked during this pay period that includes the 12th.
includedDayOfMonth.title: DayOfMonthType

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

regularWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a regular paid work activity.
regularWorkedHours.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.

paidTimeOffHours.description: The number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.

retentionDays.description: Number of days allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDate' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.
country.title: CountryCodeList
enumNames: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. It should contain an ISO 3166-2 code for the country. Example would be 'US-CA' for California for further restrictions based on the CCPA regulation.

items.title: AddressComponentType
items.description: Holds address extension components.

type.description: Specify purpose of this extension (province, secondary line, house number, etc).

policy.description: The description of the data protection policy (optionally associated with the country and optional region).

documentId.description: Provides the Identifier(s) of the document being communicated. Uniquely identifies a Document within an organization.
documentId.title: IdentifierType

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

items.title: IdentifierType
items.description: An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency. Use this type when the list or values are controlled by an external entity, the list or values are public and could be referenced or validated.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

workerId.description: Provides a unique identifier to a specific worker (an employer specific identifier).
workerId.title: IdentifierType

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

paidForWorkInPayPeriod.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

items.title: PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType
items.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

includedDayOfMonth.description: Specifies pay period that includes this day, i.e The person worked during this pay period that includes the 12th.
includedDayOfMonth.title: DayOfMonthType

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

regularWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a regular paid work activity.
regularWorkedHours.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.

items.title: WorkedHoursType
items.description: Specifies the hours worked for a specific pay type. For example, 8 hours of holiday pay.

workedPayTypeCode.description: Type of compensation, e.g. holiday, overtime, shift differential, etc.
workedPayTypeCode.title: PayTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

workedHours.description: Number of hours worked for a specific pay type.
workedHours.title: NumberType

paidTimeOffHours.description: The number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.

items.title: TimeOffHoursType
items.description: The hours a worker took off. For example, 8 hours of vacation pay.

timeOffTypeCode.description: The type of hours a worker took off, such as bereavement, jury duty, vacation, etc.
timeOffTypeCode.title: TimeOffTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

timeOffHours.description: Number of hours a worker took off.
timeOffHours.title: NumberType

allOf.title: DataProtectionPolicyInclusion
allOf.description: Data protection policy according General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).

retentionDate.description: Date until allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDays' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.
retentionDate.title: DateType

retentionDays.description: Number of days allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDate' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.
country.title: CountryCodeList

MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. It should contain an ISO 3166-2 code for the country. Example would be 'US-CA' for California for further restrictions based on the CCPA regulation.

policy.description: The description of the data protection policy (optionally associated with the country and optional region).

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

paidForWorkInPayPeriod.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

regularWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a regular paid work activity.
regularWorkedHours.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

paidForWorkInPayPeriod.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

items.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

regularWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a regular paid work activity.
regularWorkedHours.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.

allOf.title: DataProtectionPolicyInclusion
allOf.description: Data protection policy according General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).

retentionDate.description: Date until allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDays' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.
retentionDate.title: DateType

retentionDays.description: Number of days allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDate' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.
country.title: CountryCodeList
enumNames: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. It should contain an ISO 3166-2 code for the country. Example would be 'US-CA' for California for further restrictions based on the CCPA regulation.

items.title: AddressComponentType
items.description: Holds address extension components.

type.description: Specify purpose of this extension (province, secondary line, house number, etc).

policy.description: The description of the data protection policy (optionally associated with the country and optional region).

documentId.description: Provides the Identifier(s) of the document being communicated. Uniquely identifies a Document within an organization.
documentId.title: IdentifierType

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

items.title: IdentifierType
items.description: An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency. Use this type when the list or values are controlled by an external entity, the list or values are public and could be referenced or validated.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

workerId.description: Provides a unique identifier to a specific worker (an employer specific identifier).
workerId.title: IdentifierType

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

paidForWorkInPayPeriod.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

items.title: PaidForWorkInPayPeriodType
items.description: Details on if the worker was paid in a particular month.

includedDayOfMonth.description: Specifies pay period that includes this day, i.e The person worked during this pay period that includes the 12th.
includedDayOfMonth.title: DayOfMonthType

paidForWorkIndicator.description: Indicate if worker was paid in PayPeriodMonthDay and ReportedYearMonth.
paidForWorkIndicator.title: IndicatorType

regularWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a regular paid work activity.
regularWorkedHours.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.

items.title: WorkedHoursType
items.description: Specifies the hours worked for a specific pay type. For example, 8 hours of holiday pay.

workedPayTypeCode.description: Type of compensation, e.g. holiday, overtime, shift differential, etc.
workedPayTypeCode.title: PayTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

workedHours.description: Number of hours worked for a specific pay type.
workedHours.title: NumberType

paidTimeOffHours.description: The number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.

items.title: TimeOffHoursType
items.description: The hours a worker took off. For example, 8 hours of vacation pay.

timeOffTypeCode.description: The type of hours a worker took off, such as bereavement, jury duty, vacation, etc.
timeOffTypeCode.title: TimeOffTypeCodeList

description.description: A short phrase further describing the pay type.

timeOffHours.description: Number of hours a worker took off.
timeOffHours.title: NumberType

header_Prefer.name: Prefer
header_Prefer.description: Used to indicate that particular server behaviors are preferred by the consumer.  Prefer:[preference]=[value], e.g.  respond=async, return=representation, return=minimal, etc.

header_Link.description: Expresses a typed relationship with another resource, typically used in the callback scenarios to specify a callback URI
header_Link.name: Link

header_Accept.name: Accept
header_Accept.description: Accept' ': ' ( '*/*' | (type'/' '*') | (type'/'subtype)) ['; ' 'q' '='qvalue]. Describes media type(s) and subtype(s) that are acceptable for the response. The optional qvalue represents an acceptable quality level for acceptable types.

header_Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language:language|*;q=qvalue. Specifies the language(s) that are acceptable for the response. The optional qvalue represents a quality level for acceptable languages.
header_Accept-Language.name: Accept-Language

header_Content-Language.description: Specifies the languages for which the entity-body is intended

header_OAGi-Context-ExpressionID.name: OAGi-Context-ExpressionID

header_OAGi-CorrelationID.name: OAGi-CorrelationID
header_OAGi-CorrelationID.description: Contains the message identifier that can be used to correlate the response with the previous / future requests. Usually used for asynchronous / callback style communication.

header_OAGi-ConversationID.name: OAGi-ConversationID
header_OAGi-ConversationID.description: Contains the identifier of the conversation in which the request or response participates.  A conversation is the coordinated exchange of multiple messages between two or more partners. The scope of the identifier spans an entire conversation.

header_OAGi-IntermediaryID.name: OAGi-IntermediaryID
header_OAGi-IntermediaryID.description: eContains the identifier of the system that acts as an intermediary between the sending and receiving systems.

header_OAGi-MessageID.name: OAGi-MessageID
header_OAGi-MessageID.description: Contains the message identifier of the message instance (i.e. request or the response)

header_OAGi-OriginatorID.name: OAGi-Originator-ApplicationID
header_OAGi-OriginatorID.description: Identifier of the application that initiated (i.e. originated) a command request - not intended to be used as a correlation id for messages across systems participating in a collaboration

header_OAGi-ReferenceID.name: OAGi-ReferenceID
header_OAGi-ReferenceID.description: Contains the identifier of the business task instance that initiated the need for the request to be created.

header_OAGi-ScenarioID.name: OAGi-ScenarioID
header_OAGi-ScenarioID.description: Contains the identifier of the system that sent a request.

header_OAGi-SenderID.name: OAGi-SenderID

header_OAGi-UserID.name: header_OAGi-UserID
header_OAGi-UserID.description: Contains the identifier of the user that initiated the request.

header_Authorization.name: Authorization
header_Authorization.description: The Authorization header is used to provide the client’s authorization to access the resource in the following format: Authorization: {scheme credentials}, e.g. Authorization: pin 123456

header_ETag.description: Defines the entity tag for use with the If-Match and If-None-Match request headers
header_ETag.name: ETag

header_If-Match.description: Makes the request method conditional on the recipient origin server either having at least one current representation of the target resource, when the field-value is "*", or having a current representation of the target resource that has an entity-tag matching a member of the list of entity-tags provided in the field-value
header_If-Match.name: If-Match

header_If-None-Match.description: Makes the request method conditional on a recipient cache or origin server either not having any current representation of the target resource, when the field-value is "*", or having a selected representation with an entity-tag that does not match any of those listed in the field-value
header_If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match

reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

retentionDate.description: Date until allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDays' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. reportingTimePeriod.description: Defines the period of the hours paid and worked. 'As of date' would use the validTo date.
reportingTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType

totalPaidHours.description: The total number of hours for which a worker received pay. Includes all actual work hours and hours of employer-paid leave that were used.
totalPaidHours.title: NumberType

totalWorkedHours.description: The total number of hours a worker was engaged in a paid work activity, including regular and premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time. Includes work hours for which compensatory time off was earned. Does not include any employer-paid leave time used.
totalWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPremiumWorkedHours.description: The number of premium hours a worker actually worked, including stand-by time, for which a premium rate of compensation was paid. Includes overtime and hours for which shift differentials were paid such as night, holiday or weekend work. Includes hours for which compensatory time off was earned, if more than one hour of CTO was earned for each hour of actual work. Does not include any hours used of employer-paid leave time.
totalPremiumWorkedHours.title: NumberType

totalPaidTimeOffHours.description: The total number of hours of employer-paid time used by a worker for any type of absence from work including vacation, sickness, bereavement, maternity, family care, jury duty, education, meals, military duty, administrative time off, sabbatical, or other personal leave. Includes hours of compensatory time off (CTO) when used.
totalPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.description: When the employer offers such benefit as a separate accrued leave, the number of hours a worker was paid by the employer for absence from work on days of special religious, cultural, social, or patriotic significance, on which work and business ordinarily cease. Includes public and floating holiday paid leave.
totalHolidayPaidTimeOffHours.title: NumberType

workedWeeks.description: The number of weeks during which the worker earned, at a minimum, an amount of remuneration specified by the state based on time worked and paid leave taken.
workedWeeks.title: NumberType

premiumWorkedHours.description: The number of hours a worker was engaged in a premium paid work activity, including premium hours (overtime, shift differential), rest periods and stand-by time.
